LIVE VIDEO: Premier Doug Ford is holding a COVID-19 briefing at 1 p.m. He will be joined by Deputy Premier and Minister of Health Christine Elliott and others to provide an update on the province's COVID vaccination plan. #HamOnt #onpoli #COVID19 #vaccine
